transcript_text: Please hold while I try to connect you. Hello, you've reached Dave Hauser. I'm not available to come to the phone right now, but if you leave a detailed message, I will call you back as soon as possible. thanks and have a great day hi David this is Robin Montoni with main sequence we received a voicemail from you on Friday and I was just giving you a call back you might have already spoke with Garrett I assume if not or if you still need assistance please give us a call four four zero nine four six five two extension 5466. Thanks.

sentiment_analysis.summary: The employee, Robin Montoni from Main Sequence, is following up on a voicemail left by the customer, Dave Hauser, and offering assistance if needed.

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer left a voicemail on Friday and the employee is following up to see if the issue has been resolved or if the customer still needs assistance.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee left a voicemail for the customer with a callback number and extension in case the customer still needs help.

follow_up.details: The employee will wait for the customer to call back if they still need assistance.
follow_up.timeline: No specific timeline provided, but the employee is available for the customer to call back.

improvement_suggestions: Summarize the issue and any actions taken so far
Confirm with the customer if the issue is resolved or if they still need assistance
Provide a clear timeline for when the customer can expect a follow-up or resolution
